name: Mortal Kombat Arcade Kollection
description:
The Original Arcade Trilogy together for the first time in a single package, just the way you remember it. Mortal Kombat, Mortal Kombat II and Ultimate Mortal Kombat 3 enhanced with online play, leaderboards, and trophies. Maybe you were king of the arcade, but how do you stack up against the whole world?
